com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium

Class ZoomService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.ZoomService

  • public final class ZoomService
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to zoom configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • setDefaultZoomLevel

        public void setDefaultZoomLevel(double level)
        Sets the default zoom level for pages that don't override it. This method is executed synchronously, so it blocks current thread execution until zoom level is set successfully.

        To zoom in use the positive zoom level. For example, 2.0, 1.5.
        To zoom out use the negative zoom level. For example, -1.0, -2.5.

        Zoom level isn't a percentage value and 1.0 isn't equal to 100%. Zoom level is a Chromium level. To understand percentages for each zoom levels please see the following table:

        25% : "default_zoom_level": -7.6035680338478615,
        33% : "default_zoom_level": -6.0311726618503405,
        50% : "default_zoom_level": -3.8017840169239308,
        67% : "default_zoom_level": -2.2293886449264093,
        75% : "default_zoom_level": -1.5778829311823859,
        90% : "default_zoom_level": -0.5778829311823857,
        100% : "default_zoom_level": 0.0,
        110% : "default_zoom_level": 0.5227586988632231,
        125% : "default_zoom_level": 1.2239010857415449,
        150% : "default_zoom_level": 2.223901085741545,
        175% : "default_zoom_level": 3.069389038663465,
        200% : "default_zoom_level": 3.8017840169239308,
        250% : "default_zoom_level": 5.025685102665476,
        300% : "default_zoom_level": 6.025685102665476,
        400% : "default_zoom_level": 7.6035680338478615,
        500% : "default_zoom_level": 8.827469119589406

      • getDefaultZoomLevel

        public double getDefaultZoomLevel()
        Returns the default zoom level for pages that don't override it.

      • addZoomListener

        public void addZoomListener(ZoomListener listener)
        Adds the specified zoom listener to receive browser zoom change events from this browser instance.

        If listener listener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.

        Parameters:
        listener - the browser zoom listener.

      • removeZoomListener

        public void removeZoomListener(ZoomListener listener)
        Removes the specified zoom listener so that it no longer receives browser zoom change events from this browser instance.
        Parameters:
        listener - the browser zoom listener.

      • getZoomListeners

        public java.util.List<ZoomListener> getZoomListeners()
        Returns a list of all the browser zoom listeners registered on this browser.
        Returns:
        all of this browser's ZoomListeners or an empty list if no browser zoom listeners are currently registered.
